name.value: BattleWin!: Battle To Win The Ultimate Battle Of Win

item.description:
On the distant planet of BattleWin the BattleGods have summoned all the greatest Battlers of the universe together to compete in the Ultimate Battle of Win.
Using a combination of Strategy, Bluffing, and Luck.
Battlers will Battle to Win by reducing their opponents health points using numbered "Battle Army" cards combined with "Battle Strategy" Cards
The Loser is the person with the least amount of Health points at the end of the game.
Do you have what it takes?

Setup:
Players face each other with a deck of 18 Battle Army cards (2xcards numbered 1-9) and 4 Battle Strategy cards (recruit,heal,battle and block)
Take your 4 action cards and keep them in your hand.
Place your health point card where other battlers can see it. Using a marker (a coin or some other object) to indicate your health status.
Decide on the maximum amount of Health you can have for the battle. This cannot be exceeded.
Battlers shuffle their Army cards and place the deck in front of themselves. 
Each player draws one card from their Army and places it face up on the Battlefield.

Playing the game:
The game is turn-based with each player taking simultaneous turns.

During each turn, the Battlers secretly choose between one of 4 Battle Strategy cards to play.
They then place the card face down on the table.
Battlers then simultaneously flip their chosen action card to reveal their Battle Strategy

More than 2 players varient: Players must say the name of the person they wish to battle after placing their Battle Strategy card.
(Or alternativly place a card with the players number on it down with their Battle Strategy Card)

Strategies are as follows: 
Recruit = You draw 1 card from your deck and place it on the battle field (from left to right) You can only have up to 5 cards in total on the battlefield
Heal = You draw a card from your deck and regain health points to the value shown on the card. The card is discarded afterwards
Battle = You attack your opponet with the total value from adding up current Army cards you have on the battle field (Army cards are discarded afterward)
if your opponent plays either their Recruit or Heal card your battle card cancels them out and your damage is dealt. 
Block = The first 3 cards of your opponent's Battle Army are blocked if they played their Battle card.

Game ends:
The game ends when one Battler has lost all of their Health points.Or when one Battler has depleted all of their Battle Army card deck.
(if more than 2 people are playing the remaining battlers take one more turn after one of the above end conditions have occured)
The Winner is the Battler with the most Health Points at the end of the game

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
